Package io.github.augustoravazoli.termenu

Class AbstractMenu

java.lang.Object
io.github.augustoravazoli.termenu.AbstractMenu
public abstract class AbstractMenu extends Object
A menu should extend this class to work through the Run method. This class also provides utilities methods to perform terminal I/O.
Author:
Augusto Ravazoli
